title: Hinting For Food Drink
description: Authentic supplications for Hinting For Food Drink
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Hinting For Food Drink. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 183
items.arabic: ((اللَّهُمَّ أَطْعِمْ مَنْ أَطْعَمَنِي، وَاسْقِ مَنْ سَقَانِي)).
